original_title: Ike and Tina Turner - On the Road
overview: On the Road: 1971â€“72 is a documentary film about Ike & Tina Turner.[1] The footage was assembled by rock photographer Bob Gruen and his wife Nadya. The film was released in 2012 and won the 2014 Living Blues Award for Best Blues DVD of 2013.
title: Ike and Tina Turner - On the Road
